verification.message_part1: We've sent a verification link to

slides.slide1_title: Real Conversations Shouldn't Cost a Fortune
slides.slide1_description: Join 50,000+ learners speaking daily without breaking the bank.
slides.slide2_description: Unlimited do-overs without the fear that stops most learners.
slides.slide3_description: Speak when you can. Play challenges when you can't.
slides.slide4_description: Go from practicing alone to speaking freely with real people.

conversation.title: Practice Conversation
conversation.subtitle: Select your preferences
conversation.modal_info_headphones_text: For best experience, use headphones to prevent audio feedback
conversation.modal_info_speak_text: Speak at a normal pace and volume for accurate recognition
conversation.modal_info_time_text: Take your time and enjoy the conversation. There's no rush!
conversation.modal_info_conversation_text: Engage in natural dialogue. The AI will help you improve as you speak
conversation.modal_info_help_text: Get AI-powered suggestions and tips during your conversation
conversation.modal_end_message: You haven't completed the full {{minutes}}-minute session yet. If you end now, your progress won't be saved and you won't receive analysis or flashcards.

conversation.alert_plan_error_message: Failed to create learning plan. Please try again.

conversation.alert_connection_error_message: Unable to connect to the AI tutor. This might be due to temporary server issues.
conversation.alert_start_conversation_error: Failed to start a conversation. Please try again.
conversation.alert_subscription_required_message: You've used all your free practice time. Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access!
conversation.alert_dna_updated_message: Your acoustic voice profile has been updated with new data.
conversation.alert_analysis_error_message: Failed to analyze your session. You can still sign up to save your progress!
conversation.alert_save_error_message: Failed to save your session. Do you want to try again or exit anyway?
conversation.alert_no_analysis_message: No sentences were analyzed during this session. This can happen if the conversation was too short or no quality sentences were detected.

topic_selection.title: Choose a Speaking Topic

topics.introduce_yourself_desc: Talk about who you are, your background, and interests
topics.introduce_yourself_prompt: Please introduce yourself. Talk about your name, where you are from, what you do, and your interests.
topics.daily_routine_desc: Describe your typical day and daily activities
topics.daily_routine_prompt: Describe your daily routine. What do you typically do from morning to evening?
topics.favorite_place_desc: Describe a place that is special to you
topics.favorite_place_prompt: Tell me about your favorite place. Where is it and why is it special to you?
topics.travel_experience_desc: Share a memorable travel story or experience
topics.travel_experience_prompt: Share a memorable travel experience. Where did you go and what made it special?
topics.hobbies_desc: Talk about activities you enjoy in your free time
topics.hobbies_prompt: What are your hobbies and interests? Tell me about what you like to do in your free time.
topics.career_goals_prompt: Talk about your career goals and professional aspirations. What do you hope to achieve?
topics.favorite_book_movie_desc: Discuss a book or movie that impacted you
topics.favorite_book_movie_prompt: Tell me about your favorite book or movie. What is it about and why do you like it?
topics.technology_desc: Share your thoughts on technology in daily life
topics.technology_prompt: How has technology impacted your daily life? Share your thoughts on this topic.

progress.title: Your Progress
progress.no_data: No progress data yet. Start practicing!

dna.title: Your Speaking DNA
dna.subtitle: Your unique speaking fingerprint
dna.create_plan_prompt: Create a learning plan to start tracking your DNA
dna.complete_assessment_prompt:
Complete speaking assessments for
{{language}} to build your DNA profile
dna.insight_build_confidence_action: Start responses quickly, even if imperfect. Practice saying "I think..." to buy thinking time.
dna.insight_improve_grammar_action: Focus on your common error patterns. Repeat corrected sentences out loud 3 times.
dna.insight_expand_vocabulary_action: Use one new word per session. Write it down and use it in 3 different sentences.
dna.insight_accept_challenges_action: Say YES to the next challenge offered. Growth happens outside comfort zones!
dna.insight_balance_speed_action: It's OK to make mistakes! Focus on communicating your ideas first.
dna.insight_varied_vocabulary_action: Try synonyms for common words. Replace "good" with "excellent", "great", "wonderful".
dna.insight_default_action: Keep practicing regularly to see improvement in this area.
dna.strength_confident_speaker_desc: You respond quickly and naturally in conversations
dna.strength_accuracy_master_desc: Your grammar and pronunciation are consistently strong
dna.strength_word_explorer_desc: You experiment with diverse vocabulary and expressions
dna.strength_challenge_seeker_desc: You embrace difficult topics and learning opportunities
dna.strength_steady_learner_desc: You maintain consistent practice and steady progress
dna.strength_default_desc: Keep leveraging this strength in your practice
dna.focus_reduce_hesitation_tip: Start speaking within 2 seconds of each question this week
dna.focus_master_errors_tip_default: Pay attention to corrections and repeat them
dna.focus_learn_words_tip: Pick words from your sessions and use them daily
dna.focus_accept_challenges_tip: Say YES when the AI offers harder topics or exercises
dna.focus_default_tip: Focus on this area during your practice sessions this week
dna.voice_unavailable_subtitle: Complete a speaking assessment to capture your unique acoustic fingerprint
dna.error_premium_required: Speaking DNA is a premium feature. Please upgrade your subscription.
dna.empty_subtitle: Complete a speaking session to create your unique Speaking DNA profile.

legal_documents.contact_subtitle_terms: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us:
legal_documents.contact_subtitle_privacy: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of Language Tutor's services. Please read carefully before using our platform.

agreement.subtitle: Agreement to Terms
agreement.text: By accessing and using Language Tutor's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

eligibility.subtitle: Eligibility
eligibility.text: You must be at least 13 years old to use our services. If you are under 18, you must have your parent or guardian's permission to use our services.

permitted_use.subtitle: Permitted Use
permitted_use.text: You may use our services for personal, non-commercial language learning purposes. You agree to use the services in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.

account_responsibility.subtitle: Account Responsibility
account_responsibility.text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account.

prohibited_activities.subtitle: Prohibited Activities
prohibited_activities.text: You may not use our services to engage in illegal activities, harass other users, distribute malware, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.

our_content.subtitle: Our Content
our_content.text: All content, features, and functionality of our services, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by Language Tutor and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

user_content.subtitle: User Content
user_content.text: You retain ownership of any content you create or upload to our services. By using our services, you grant us a license to use, modify, and display your content for the purpose of providing our services.

data_collection.subtitle: Data Collection
data_collection.text: Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of information as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

learning_data.subtitle: Learning Data
learning_data.text: We may use aggregated and anonymized learning data to improve our services and develop new features. Individual user data is never shared without explicit consent.

disclaimer.subtitle: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.

maximum_liability.subtitle: Maximum Liability
maximum_liability.text: Our total liability to you for any claims arising from your use of our services shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.

termination.title: Termination
termination.text_part1: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our services immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
termination.text_part2: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us or using the account deletion feature in your settings. Upon termination, your right to use the services will cease immediately.

privacy.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

personal_information.subtitle: Personal Information
personal_information.text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our language learning services, or contact us for support. This includes your name, email address, and learning preferences.

learning_data.subtitle: Learning Data
learning_data.text: To provide personalized learning experiences, we collect data about your progress, conversation transcripts, assessment results, and usage patterns within our platform.

technical_information.subtitle: Technical Information
technical_information.text: We automatically collect certain technical information, including your device type, browser information, IP address, and how you interact with our services.

service_provision.subtitle: Service Provision
service_provision.text: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our language learning services, including personalizing your learning experience and tracking your progress.

communication.subtitle: Communication
communication.text: We may use your contact information to send you important updates about our services, respond to your inquiries, and provide customer support.

analytics_improvement.subtitle: Analytics and Improvement
analytics_improvement.text: We analyze usage patterns and feedback to improve our platform, develop new features, and enhance the overall learning experience.

no_sale.subtitle: No Sale of Data
no_sale.text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties for commercial purposes.

service_providers.subtitle: Service Providers
service_providers.text: We may share information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting our business, or serving our users.

legal_requirements.subtitle: Legal Requirements
legal_requirements.text: We may disclose your information when required by law, court order, or other legal process, or when we believe disclosure is necessary to protect our rights or the safety of others.

security_measures.subtitle: Security Measures
security_measures.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

encryption.subtitle: Encryption
encryption.text: We use industry-standard encryption to protect sensitive data both in transit and at rest on our servers.

access_controls.subtitle: Access Controls
access_controls.text: We maintain strict access controls and regularly review our security practices to ensure your data remains protected.

access_correction.subtitle: Access and Correction
access_correction.text: You have the right to access and update your personal information at any time through your account settings.

data_deletion.subtitle: Data Deletion
data_deletion.text: You may request deletion of your account and associated data by contacting us. Note that some information may be retained as required by law or for legitimate business purposes.

opt_out.subtitle: Opt-Out
opt_out.text: You can opt-out of marketing communications at any time by using the unsubscribe link in our emails or adjusting your notification preferences.
